attributes.action: Tougher sentences for drug dealers, theives and bogus officials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I personally think that all of the above are the scum of the earth and need to be dealt with by means of longer prison sentences. My wifes ill Grandmother was a victim of a bogus water board man, I was a victim of a theft which destroyed my livelyhood and lost a friend due to a drug pusher. If you support me then PLEASE SIGN MY PETITION!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
